--p-background.description: For use as a background color, in components such as Page and Frame backgrounds.

--p-background-hovered.description: For use when an action or navigation is used on a background.

--p-background-pressed.description: For use when an action or navigation is used on a background.

--p-background-selected.description: For use in the selected item in navigation

--p-surface.description: For use as a background color, in components such as Card, Modal, and Popover.

--p-surface-dark.description: For use as a dark background color, in components such as Card, Modal, and Popover.

--p-surface-neutral.description: For use as a background color in neutral badges.

--p-surface-neutral-hovered.description: For use as a hovered background color in neutral badges.

--p-surface-neutral-pressed.description: For use as a pressed background color in neutral badges.

--p-surface-neutral-disabled.description: For use as a disabled background color in neutral badges.

--p-surface-neutral-subdued.description: For use as a background color in neutral banners.

--p-surface-neutral-subdued-dark.description: For use as a dark background color in neutral banners.

--p-surface-subdued.description: For use as a subdued background color, in components such as Card, Modal, and Popover.

--p-surface-disabled.description: For use as a surface color on disabled interactive elements such as option list items and action list items when in a disabled state.

--p-surface-hovered.description: For use as a surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a hovered state.

--p-surface-hovered-dark.description: For use as a dark surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a hovered state.

--p-surface-pressed.description: For use as a surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a pressed state.

--p-surface-pressed-dark.description: For use as a dark surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a pressed state.

--p-surface-depressed.description: For use as a surface color on interactive elements such as resource list items and action list items when in a depressed state.

--p-surface-search-field.description: For use as a background color, in components on surface elements such as SearchField

--p-surface-search-field-dark.description: For use as a dark background color, in components on surface elements such as SearchField

--p-backdrop.description: For use as the background color of the backdrop component for navigation and modal. This color has an alpha of `0.5`.

--p-overlay.description: For use as the background color of elements which lay on top of surfaces to obscure their contents. This color has an alpha of `0.5`.

--p-hint-from-direct-light.description: For use in building shadows scrollables.

--p-border.description: For use as the default border on elements.

--p-border-on-dark.description: For use as the default border on dark elements.

--p-border-neutral-subdued.description: For use as the border on banners.

--p-border-hovered.description: Used for borders on hovered interactive elements

--p-border-disabled.description: Used for disabled borders on interactive elements

--p-border-subdued.description: For use as a subdued border on elements.

--p-border-depressed.description: For use as a border on depressed elements.

--p-border-shadow.description: For use as an additional bottom border on elements.

--p-border-shadow-subdued.description: For use as an additional, subdued bottom border on elements.

--p-divider.description: For use as a divider between elements.

--p-divider-dark.description: For use as a dark divider between elements.

--p-icon.description: For use as the fill color of icons.

--p-icon-on-dark.description: For use as the fill color of dark icons.

--p-icon-hovered.description: For use as the fill color of hovered icons.

--p-icon-pressed.description: For use as the fill color of pressed icons.

--p-icon-disabled.description: For use as the fill color of disabled icons.

--p-icon-subdued.description: For use as the fill color of subdued icons.

--p-text.description: For use as a text color.

--p-text-on-dark.description: For use as a text color on dark elements.

--p-text-disabled.description: For use as a disabled text color and as a placeholder text color.

--p-text-subdued.description: For use as a subdued text color.

--p-text-subdued-on-dark.description: For use as a subdued text color on dark elements.

--p-interactive.description: Used for links, plain buttons, and as the fill color for selected checkboxes and radio buttons.

--p-interactive-on-dark.description: Used for links, plain buttons, and as the fill color for selected checkboxes and radio buttons when on a dark element.

--p-interactive-disabled.description: Used for disabled links and plain buttons.

--p-interactive-hovered.description: Used for hovered links and plain buttons.

--p-interactive-pressed.description: Used for pressed links and plain buttons.

--p-interactive-pressed-on-dark.description: Used for pressed links and plain buttons on dark elements.

--p-focused.description: For use in the focus ring on interactive elements.

--p-surface-selected.description: For use as a surface color in selected interactive elements, in components such as action list and resource list.

--p-surface-selected-hovered.description: For use as a surface color in selected interactive elements that are hovered, in components such as action list and resource list.

--p-surface-selected-pressed.description: For use as a surface color in selected interactive elements that are pressed, in components such as action list and resource list.

--p-icon-on-interactive.description: For use as a fill color for icons on interactive elements.

--p-text-on-interactive.description: For use as a text color on interactive elements.

--p-action-secondary.description: Used for secondary buttons and tertiary buttons, as well as in form elements as a background color and pontentially other secondary surfaces.

--p-action-secondary-disabled.description: Used as a disabled state for secondary buttons

--p-action-secondary-hovered.description: Used as a hovered state for secondary buttons

--p-action-secondary-hovered-dark.description: Used as a dark hovered state for secondary buttons

--p-action-secondary-pressed.description: Used as a pressed state for secondary buttons

--p-action-secondary-pressed-dark.description: Used as a dark pressed state for secondary buttons

--p-action-secondary-depressed.description: Used as a depressed state for secondary buttons

--p-action-primary.description: Used as the background color for primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.

--p-action-primary-disabled.description: Used as the background color for disabled primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.

--p-action-primary-hovered.description: Used as the background color for hovered primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.

--p-action-primary-pressed.description: Used as the background color for pressed primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.

--p-action-primary-depressed.description: Used as the background color for pressed primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.

--p-icon-on-primary.description: For use as a fill color for icons on primary actions. Not for use in icons on navigation and tabs.

--p-text-on-primary.description: For use as a text color on primary actions. Not for use in text on navigation and tabs.

--p-text-primary.description: For use as primary text color on background. For use in text in components such as Navigation.

--p-text-primary-hovered.description: For use as primary hovered text color on background. For use in text in components such as Navigation.

--p-text-primary-pressed.description: For use as primary pressed text color on background. For use in text in components such as Navigation.

--p-surface-primary-selected.description: Used as a surface color to indicate selected interactive states in navigation and tabs.

--p-surface-primary-selected-hovered.description: Used as a surface color to indicate selected interactive states that are hovered in navigation and tabs.

--p-surface-primary-selected-pressed.description: Used as a surface color to indicate selected interactive states that are pressed in navigation and tabs.

--p-border-critical.description: For use as a border on critical components such as an outline on interactive elements in an error state.

--p-border-critical-subdued.description: For use as a border on critical components such as banners.

--p-border-critical-disabled.description: For use as a disabled border on critical components such as banners, and as an outline on interactive elements in an error state.

--p-icon-critical.description: For use as an icon fill color on top of critical elements.

--p-surface-critical.description: For use as a surface color on critical elements including badges.

--p-surface-critical-subdued.description: For use as a subdued surface color on critical elements including banners.

--p-surface-critical-subdued-hovered.description: For use as a surface color on critical interactive elements including action list items in a hovered state.

--p-surface-critical-subdued-pressed.description: For use as a surface color on critical interactive elements including action list items in a pressed state.

--p-surface-critical-subdued-depressed.description: For use as a surface color on critical interactive elements including action list items in a depressed state.

--p-text-critical.description: For use as a text color in inert critical elements such as exception list. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.

--p-action-critical.description: For use as the background color for destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.

--p-action-critical-disabled.description: For use as the background color for disabled destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.

--p-action-critical-hovered.description: For use as the background color for hovered destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.

--p-action-critical-pressed.description: For use as the background color for pressed destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.

--p-action-critical-depressed.description: For use as the background color for depressed destructive buttons, and as the background color for error toast messages.

--p-icon-on-critical.description: For use as a fill color for icons on critical actions.

--p-text-on-critical.description: For use as a text color on critical actions.

--p-interactive-critical.description: For use as the text color for destructive interactive elements: links, plain buttons, error state of selected checkboxes and radio buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.

--p-interactive-critical-disabled.description: For use as a text color in disabled destructive plain buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.

--p-interactive-critical-hovered.description: For use as a text color in hovered destructive plain buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.

--p-interactive-critical-pressed.description: For use as a text color in pressed destructive plain buttons, as well as a text color on destructive action list items. Not for use on critical banners and badges.

--p-border-warning.description: For use as a border on warning components such as...

--p-border-warning-subdued.description: For use as a border on warning components such as banners.

--p-icon-warning.description: For use as an icon fill color on top of warning elements.

--p-surface-warning.description: For use as a surface color on warning elements including badges.

--p-surface-warning-subdued.description: For use as a subdued surface color on warning elements including banners.

--p-surface-warning-subdued-hovered.description: For use as a subdued surface color on warning elements including banners.

--p-surface-warning-subdued-pressed.description: For use as a subdued surface color on warning elements including banners.

--p-text-warning.description: For use as a text color in inert critical elements such as exception list. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.

--p-border-highlight.description: For use as a border on informational components such as...

--p-border-highlight-subdued.description: For use as a border on informational components such as banners.

--p-icon-highlight.description: For use as an icon fill color on top of informational elements.

--p-surface-highlight.description: For use as a surface color on information elements including badges.

--p-surface-highlight-subdued.description: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.

--p-surface-highlight-subdued-hovered.description: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.

--p-surface-highlight-subdued-pressed.description: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.

--p-text-highlight.description: For use as a text color in inert informational elements. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.

--p-border-success.description: For use as a border on success components such as text inputs.

--p-border-success-subdued.description: For use as a border on success components such as banners.

--p-icon-success.description: For use as an icon fill color on top of success elements.

--p-surface-success.description: For use as a surface color on success elements including badges.

--p-surface-success-subdued.description: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.

--p-surface-success-subdued-hovered.description: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.

--p-surface-success-subdued-pressed.description: For use as a surface color on information elements including banners.

--p-text-success.description: For use as a text color in inert success elements. Not for use as a text color on banners and badges.

--p-decorative-one-icon.description: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-one-surface.description: For use as a decorative surface color.

--p-decorative-one-text.description: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-two-icon.description: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-two-surface.description: For use as a decorative surface color.

--p-decorative-two-text.description: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-three-icon.description: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-three-surface.description: For use as a decorative surface color.

--p-decorative-three-text.description: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-four-icon.description: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-four-surface.description: For use as a decorative surface color.

--p-decorative-four-text.description: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-five-icon.description: For use as a decorative icon color that is applied on a decorative surface.

--p-decorative-five-surface.description: For use as a decorative surface color.

--p-decorative-five-text.description: For use as a decorative text color that is applied on a decorative surface.
